price: 47. (Ibraahiim) wuxuu yidhi: “Nabad korkaada ha ahaato! Waxaan kaaga baryi denbi Dhaaf Rabbigay. Waa Mid ii Roonaan Badane.
arabic: قَالَ سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكَۖ سَأَسۡتَغۡفِرُ لَكَ رَبِّيٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِي حَفِيّٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla salāmun ʿalayka sa-astaghfiru laka rabbī innahu kāna bī ḥafiyyan
